amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in part B of House Report 106-235 which are printed on pages H5793-H5795 in the Congressional Record for July 19, 1999.
amendment.purpose: Amendments printed in Part B of H.Rept. 106-235 consisting of Capuano no. 5; Sanders no. 7; Rohrabacher no. 9, as modified; Rohrabacherno. 12, as modified; Sanders no. 14; Salmon no. 16, as modified; Andrews no. 17; Ehlers no. 19; Capps no. 20; Engel no. 21; Engel no. 38; Delahunt no. 39; and Hall of Ohio no. 40, as modified.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
